stories.text:
Seeing problems reflected on down detector but no news reports.

https://downdetector.com/status/visa/
stories.title: Nationwide credit card processing outage?

stories.text:
A bit of googling gives the impression that I'm not the only person with this problem.

It doesn't seem to be linked to heavy usage of CPU or memory, and it does seem to go away after a reboot, but starts happening again fairly shortly after.

Has anyone sucessfully resolved it? This is driving me nuts!

stories.text: I once read that it is possible to have a phone number (in the US) longer than 10 digits. How could this be done?
